properties.entry: SELECT A.RNUM, A.ORDER_CODE, A.USER_NAME, A.STORE_NAME, A.ORDER_TIME, A.TOTAL_AMOUNT, A.USER_PHONE, A.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.ORDER_CODE, B.USER_NAME, B.STORE_NAME, B.ORDER_TIME, B.TOTAL_AMOUNT, B.USER_PHONE, B.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM (SELECT C.ORDER_CODE, D.USER_NAME, E.STORE_NAME, C.ORDER_TIME, C.TOTAL_AMOUNT, D.USER_PHONE, F.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM ORDER_TABLE C JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) JOIN STORE_TABLE E ON(C.STORE_CODE = E.STORE_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE F ON(E.USER_CODE = F.USER_CODE) ORDER BY C.ORDER_CODE DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
